txt.en: Stay with the horse and use the right emote
Stay with the horse and use the right emote
Horses can be trained and respond to different tones of voice or signals.
'The new horse that came here with you from Combe looks anxious, and you should spend some time with him. Head out into the Horse-fields and see what you can do.'
The horse can be found out in the Horse-fields.
'Well done! The horse just got back before you, and he is looking much more comfortable.'
